net.krotscheck.jersey2.vfs2

Class VFS2Feature

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.krotscheck.jersey2.vfs2.VFS2Feature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.ws.rs.core.Feature

    public final class VFS2Feature
extends Object
implements javax.ws.rs.core.Feature
    This jersey2 feature provides various helper classes that may be used to access a virtual file system instance (as per apache commons-vfs2). It may be used explicitly by injecting the FileSystemManager and resolving your files from there. Please make sure that any file opened is closed in the scope of your request.
    Author:
    Michael Krotscheck
